subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: In the wake of a 27-0 thrashing by the Eagles, a Giants team that had been riding a three-game winning streak had a day of soul-searching, and some finger-pointing.
snippet: In the wake of a 27-0 thrashing by the Eagles, a Giants team that had been riding a three-game winning streak had a day of soul-searching, and some finger-pointing.
